Uses of Transform in gwt.ns.transformedelement.client
 

Methods in gwt.ns.transformedelement.client with parameters of type Transform
 void TransformedElement.getTransform(Transform dest)
          A copy of the current transform is written to dest.
 void TransformedElement.multiply(Transform local)
          Apply a transformation in the current local coordinate system by setting the transform equal to the current transform multiplied by local, with local on the right.
 void TransformedElement.multiply(Transform view, Transform local)
          Set the current transform equal to view multiplied by local, with view on the left and local on the right.
 void TransformedElement.multiplyView(Transform view)
          Apply a transformation in the current view coordinate system by setting the transform equal to view multiplied by the current transform, with view on the left.
 void TransformedElement.setTransform(Transform newTransform)
          Apply a new transform to this element from a Transform.

          Returns a new, platform appropriate Transform object.

          Applies a transform in local coordinates to this matrix.
